name: Belt Scrapper
description:
▶️ Collect the green scraps and destroy the grey asteroids!

Collect scraps, destroy asteroids!

You are a belt scrapper who navigates through the dangerous asteroid belt of our solar system to collect scraps. Your tractor beam pulls everything into your cargo bay. Be careful though: If an asteroid enters your ship it will damage it. So destroy them before they can reach your ship.

Controls

Hold 'A' or 'D' to move the laser left or right. Press 'Space' to shoot. In the upgrade menu press 'W' or 'S' to move the cursor and 'Space' to select. 

Background

This game was made in 3 Hours for Trijam #204: The 3 hour game jam!

The theme of the jam was "Blocked". In the game, you block asteroids from entering your cargo bay.

This jam was tough. I barely finished in time and had to scrap a few features. Still proud that I finished another Trijam!
